mapper.select: SELECT s.showing_seat_cnt - (SELECT count(*) FROM show_seat ss WHERE s.showing_seq = ss.showing_seq AND show_seat_status = 'N') remaining_seats FROM showing s WHERE s.showing_seq = #{showing_seq};

SELECT p.play_name, p.play_major_cat, p.play_middle_cat, p.play_run_time, p.play_poster, p.play_info, p.agency_id, sc.seat_price, (SELECT stg.stage_name FROM showing s JOIN stage stg ON s.stage_id = stg.stage_id WHERE s.play_id = p.play_id GROUP BY stg.stage_name) stage_name FROM play p JOIN seat_class sc ON p.play_id = sc.play_id WHERE p.play_id = #{play_id};
SELECT showing_date, showing_info FROM showing s WHERE s.play_id = #{play_id} ORDER BY showing_date;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE review_num = #{review_num} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_num, review_at, review_star_rating, review_viewing_at, review_content, -- review_star_rating_avg, review_total, user_id, play_id, created_at, created_id, updated_at, updated_id) VALUES (#{review_num}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{review_star_rating}, #{review_viewing_at}, #{review_content}, -- (SELECT AVG(review_star_rating) FROM review), '0', #{user_id}, #{play_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{user_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{user_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_content = #{review_content}, review_star_rating = #{review_star_rating}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE review_num = #{review_num}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, review_at, review_star_rating, review_viewing_at, review_content FROM review ORDER BY review_at DESC
SELECT review_num, review_at, review_star_rating, review_viewing_at, review_content, review_total, user_id, play_id FROM review WHERE review_num = #{review_num}
